sql.query:
SELECT m_restaurant.shop_logo, rsi.sliding_image1, rsi.sliding_image2, rsi.sliding_image3, rsi.cover_image, rkyc.upload_pan, rkyc.upload_gstin, rkyc.upload_rmc, rkyc.upload_fsc, rkyc.upload_aadhar_front, rkyc.upload_aadhar_back, rkyc.other_id_proof, rkyc.bank_account, rkyc.owner_image
FROM m_restaurant
LEFT JOIN rest_sliding_img AS rsi ON (rsi.rest_id = m_restaurant.id) LEFT JOIN rest_kyc_doc AS rkyc ON (rkyc.rest_id = m_restaurant.id)

UPDATE m_restaurant
SET shop_name_en = :P1 /* {{$_POST.shop_name_en}} */, shop_name_bn = :P2 /* {{$_POST.shop_name_bn}} */, shop_name_hin = :P3 /* {{$_POST.shop_name_hin}} */, shop_logo = :P4 /* {{$_POST.logo?+'/assets/img/restaurant/'+uploadLogo.name:''}} */, shop_mobile_no = :P5 /* {{$_POST.shop_mobile_no}} */, is_watsapp = :P6 /* {{$_POST.is_watsapp}} */, watsapp_no = :P7 /* {{$_POST.whatsapp_no}} */, email_id = :P8 /* {{$_POST.email_id}} */, owner_name = :P9 /* {{$_POST.owner_name}} */, gst_in = :P10 /* {{$_POST.gst_in}} */, is_rmc = :P11 /* {{$_POST.is_rmc}} */, rmc_no = :P12 /* {{$_POST.rmc_no}} */, is_fsc = :P13 /* {{$_POST.is_fsc}} */, is_sliding_img = :P14 /* {{$_POST.is_sliding_img}} */, pan_no = :P15 /* {{$_POST.pan_no}} */, address = :P16 /* {{$_POST.address}} */, pin = :P17 /* {{$_POST.pin}} */, kyc_status = :P18 /* {{$_POST.kyc_status}} */, status = :P19 /* {{$_POST.status}} */, remarks = :P20 /* {{$_POST.remarks}} */, updated_on = :P21 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE id = :P22 /* {{$_POST.EditRestaurantId}} */

UPDATE rest_sliding_img
SET sliding_image1 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.SlidingImage1?+'/assets/img/restaurant-sliding-img/'+uploadSlidingImage1.name:GetOldImage.sliding_image1}} */, sliding_image2 = :P2 /* {{$_POST.SlidingImage2?+'/assets/img/restaurant-sliding-img/'+uploadSlidingImage2.name:GetOldImage.sliding_image2}} */, sliding_image3 = :P3 /* {{$_POST.sliding_image3?+'/assets/img/restaurant-sliding-img/'+uploadSlidingImage3.name:GetOldImage.sliding_image3}} */, cover_image = :P4 /* {{$_POST.CoverImage?+'/assets/img/restaurant/'+uploadCoverImage.name:GetOldImage.cover_image}} */, updated_on = :P5 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE rest_id = :P6 /* {{$_POST.EditRestaurantId}} */

UPDATE rest_kyc_doc
SET upload_pan = :P1 /* {{$_POST.upload_pan?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadPAN.name:GetOldImage.upload_pan}} */, upload_gstin = :P2 /* {{$_POST.upload_gstin?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadGstIn.name:GetOldImage.upload_gstin}} */, upload_rmc = :P3 /* {{$_POST.upload_rmc?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadRMC.name:GetOldImage.upload_rmc}} */, upload_fsc = :P4 /* {{$_POST.upload_fsc?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadFSC.name:GetOldImage.upload_fsc}} */, upload_aadhar_front = :P5 /* {{$_POST.upload_aadhar_front?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadAadharFront.name:GetOldImage.upload_aadhar_front}} */, upload_aadhar_back = :P6 /* {{$_POST.upload_aadhar_back?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadAadharBack.name:GetOldImage.upload_aadhar_back}} */, other_id_proof = :P7 /* {{$_POST.other_id_proof?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadOtherId.name:GetOldImage.other_id_proof}} */, bank_account = :P8 /* {{$_POST.bank_account?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadBankAC.name:GetOldImage.bank_account}} */, owner_image = :P9 /* {{$_POST.owner_image?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadOwnerImage.name:GetOldImage.owner_image}} */, updated_on = :P10 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE rest_id = :P11 /* {{$_POST.EditRestaurantId}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM m_restaurant
WHERE market_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.MarketId}} */

SELECT market_code
FROM m_market
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.MarketId}} */

INSERT INTO m_restaurant
(market_id, cat_type_id, gen_shop_id, shop_name_en, shop_name_bn, shop_name_hin, shop_mobile_no, is_watsapp, watsapp_no, email_id, owner_name, gst_in, is_rmc, rmc_no, is_fsc, balance_amount, is_sliding_img, pan_no, address, pin, status, created_by, created_on, kyc_status, shop_logo) VALUES (:P1 /* {{$_POST.MarketId}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.CategoryTypeId}} */, :P3 /* {{NewRestId}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.shop_name_en}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.shop_name_bn}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.shop_name_hin}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.shop_mobile_no}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.is_watsapp}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.whatsapp_no}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.email_id}} */, :P11 /* {{$_POST.owner_name}} */, :P12 /* {{$_POST.gst_in}} */, :P13 /* {{$_POST.is_rmc}} */, :P14 /* {{$_POST.rmc_no}} */, :P15 /* {{$_POST.is_fsc}} */, :P16 /* {{0}} */, :P17 /* {{$_POST.is_sliding_img}} */, :P18 /* {{$_POST.pan_no}} */, :P19 /* {{$_POST.address}} */, :P20 /* {{$_POST.pin}} */, :P21 /* {{1}} */, :P22 /* {{identity}} */, :P23 /* {{NOW}} */, :P24 /* {{0}} */, :P25 /* {{$_POST.logo?+'/assets/img/restaurant/'+uploadLogo.name:''}} */)

INSERT INTO rest_sliding_img
(rest_id, sliding_image1, sliding_image2, sliding_image3, cover_image, status, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddRestaurant.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.sliding_image1?+'/assets/img/restaurant-sliding-img/'+uploadSlidingImage1.name:''}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.SlidingImage2?+'/assets/img/restaurant-sliding-img/'+uploadSlidingImage2.name:''}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.sliding_image3?+'/assets/img/restaurant-sliding-img/'+uploadSlidingImage3.name:''}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.CoverImage?+'/assets/img/restaurant/'+uploadCoverImage.name:''}} */, :P6 /* {{1}} */, :P7 /* {{identity}} */, :P8 /* {{NOW}} */)

INSERT INTO rest_kyc_doc
(rest_id, upload_pan, upload_gstin, upload_rmc, upload_fsc, upload_aadhar_front, upload_aadhar_back, other_id_proof, bank_account, owner_image, status, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddRestaurant.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.upload_pan?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadPAN.name:''}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.upload_gstin?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadGstIn.name:''}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.upload_rmc?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadRMC.name:''}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.upload_fsc?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadFSC.name:''}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.upload_aadhar_front?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadAadharFront.name:''}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.upload_aadhar_back?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadAadharBack.name:''}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.other_id_proof?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadOtherId.name:''}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.bank_account?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadBankAC.name:''}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.owner_image?+'/assets/img/restaurant-kyc/'+uploadOwnerImage.name:''}} */, :P11 /* {{1}} */, :P12 /* {{identity}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */)
